summary: SPEED ABOUT 65 TO 70 MPH, TRAVELING DOWN AN INTERSTATE.  CAME TO A BRIDGE JOINT ON ROAD AND TRUCK FELT AS IF I LOST FRONT TIRE OR SOMETHING.  SLOWED DOWN AND PARKED TRUCK ON SIDE OF ROAD.  EVERYTHING APPEARED FINE AFTER INSPECTION.  CONTINUED TRIP WITH NO FURTHER PROBLEMS, I JUST KEPT IT AT 55 THE REST OF TRIP.  NO MODS TO THE TRUCK, ALL FACTORY.  *TR
